doc.course_introduction: Systems that perform big data analytics require highly distributed architectures and new levels of memory and processing power. This course covers main topics associated with systems such as Hadopp MapReduce, Apache Spark, and Graph Processing Engines.
doc.course_chapter: GETTING STARTED//Data Management in MapReduce Systems//Data Management in Apache Spark and Apache Hadoop
doc.course_sub_chapter: [['Introduction to Big Data Tools'], ['Data Management in MapReduce', 'MapReduce: How it Works', 'HDFS', 'MapReduce Programming Model', 'Visualization of MapReduce System', 'MapReduce Execution Details', 'Operators in MapReduce'], ['Apache Spark RDD Data Processing System', 'Spark Ecosystem', 'Common Components of Apache Hadoop']]
